LEADERBOARD.XPLEVELREQUIREDEXPLAIN: E.g. To be eligible for this leaderboard, player needs to be on xp level between {{min}} and {{max}}.
LEADERBOARD.XPLEVELREQUIREDEXPLAIN2: E.g. To be eligible for this leaderboard, a minimum/maximum xp level can be specified here. This is an optional grouping/restriction. If none specified, all levels will be used in the grouping specified below.

XPLEVELMIN.TITLE: XP Level (minimum)
XPLEVELMIN.DESC: Minimum XP Level before the grouping below is considered. If none specified, all levels considered.

XPLEVELMAX.TITLE: XP Level (maximum)
XPLEVELMAX.DESC: Maximum XP Level before the grouping below is considered. If none specified, all levels considered.
